pr_title: Allow dependently-typed object method declarations and fix subtyping

timeline.message: Update error message for invalid dependently-typed function
Fix compile-time subtyping and add tests
Disallow non-dependently-typed functions as dependently-typed functions
Consider param position for dependently-typed return type subtyping
Add referred param index to BParameterizedType
Introduce the BParameterizedType for the runtime
Update bir.ksy for parameterized type param index

timeline.bodyText: Do we need to export creating ParameterizedType using Typecreator api for interop developers?

replies.bodyText:
Right now, I can't think of a scenario where there'll be a requirement to create one in the external implementation.
ParameterizedType is only expected to be used as the return type of a function/method atm anyway. Given that we don't expose creating a FunctionType right now, as discussed I think we can defer this until there is a requirement.
